about_the_game:
Nothing says Autumn like decorations! We have them for you in spades in the EERIE ITEMS DLC pack! Give your homestead a little glow up (or darken down in this case??) with the following placeable items (pumpkin spice scent not included):

1 New House Skin - Carved Pumpkin

  • Carved Pumpkin House
Pumpkin Spice Lodging.

5 Cobweb variations

  • Big Web (cobweb 5)
For badass spiders.

  • Lil Web (cobweb 3)
For cute spiders.

  • Corner Web (cobweb 1)
Dusty corners.

  • Other Corner Web (cobweb 2)
Clean your corners!

  • Ceiling Web (cobweb 4)
How'd it get up there?

1 New rug

  • Tongue Rug
BLEHHHHH!

2 Jack-o-lanterns

  • Jack O'Lantern (1)
Grumpy pumpkin.

  • Jill O'Lantern (2)
Pre-carved.

1 Candle Set

  • Candle clump
Aesthetic fire hazards.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux (Ubuntu 20.04)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 / Radeon HD 5850
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux (Ubuntu 22.04)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 7 2700X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti / Radeon R9 280X

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Catalina 10.15
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555X
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Catalina 10.15
  • Processor: M1 Octa Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555X
